metadata.title: CVE-2024-40928 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: ethtool: fix the error condition in ethtool_get_phy_stats_ethtool()Clang static checker (scan-build) warning:net/ethtool/ioctl.c:line 2233, column 2Called function pointer is null (null dereference).Return '-EOPNOTSUPP' when 'ops->get_ethtool_phy_stats' is NULL to fixthis typo error.
